main.name: Joerick A. Ariate
main.description: I am a software engineer and I use React and Microsoft technologies to develop applications
main.bio: I'm Joerick A. Ariate a software engineer for over 5 years. I love learning new technologies, particulary web related ones. I also have experience in desktop and AI development such as chatbot and image processing projects. I'm a competetive person and I love challenges because with that, I'm able to learn new things while developing my character and skills as well.
